title: Online Writing Skills Development Program Utilizing Visual Imagery

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Emphasizing social studies-related writing skills for pre-service teachers, with digital project-based learning environments

learning_goals: Effectively integrate visual materials (infographics, charts, etc.) into online writing tasks
Learners can systematically improve their writing structure from draft to final version based on online feedback.
Learners can produce a logically structured and polished social studies educational brochure through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
